'''The Hearth's Ashen Shadow''' is a [[Character Event Wish]] in [[Version 4.6]].

==Wish Details==
===Duration===
* 2024-04-24 11:00:00 UTC+8 &mdash; 2024-05-14 17:59:59

===Summary===
* In this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character {{Wish Item|Arlecchino}} will get a huge drop-rate boost!
* During this event wish, the 4-star characters {{Wish Item|Freminet;Lynette;Xiangling}} will receive a huge drop-rate boost!
* Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]."
* For information about rates, see [[Wish]]es.
